member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.LightType
member.summary: Gets or sets the light type.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.DiffuseColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the diffuse light given off by this source.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.DiffusePower
member.summary: Gets or sets the power of the diffuse light given off by this source.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.SpecularColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the specular light given off by this source.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.SpecularPower
member.summary: Gets or sets the power of the specular light given off by this source.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.AttenuationNear
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance in which gradual loss in intensity begins take effect.
member.remarks: This property only applies in programmable pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.AttenuationFar
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance in which intensity is reduced to zero.
member.remarks: This property applies in both the fixed function and the programmable pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.AttenuationPower
member.summary: Gets or sets the curvature of the light attenuation.
member.remarks: This property only applies in programmable pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.FFPAttenuationConstant
member.summary: Gets or sets the attenuation constant parameter of the light source ie how it diminishes with distance.
member.remarks: This property only applies in fixed function pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.FFPAttenuationLinear
member.summary: Gets or sets the attenuation linear parameter of the light source ie how it diminishes with distance.
member.remarks: This property only applies in fixed function pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.FFPAttenuationQuadric
member.summary: Gets or sets the attenuation Quadric parameter of the light source ie how it diminishes with distance.
member.remarks: This property only applies in fixed function pipeline.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.SpotlightInnerAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle covered by the spotlights inner cone.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.SpotlightOuterAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle covered by the spotlights outer cone.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.SpotlightFalloff
member.summary: Gets or sets the falloff between the inner and outer cones of the spotlight.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.SceneBox.SceneBoxLight.CastShadows
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not this object will cast shadows.

member.name: P:Engine.UISystem.In3dControlManager._ScreenPixelSizeHeight
